rel_1_to_2.dynamic: Alex regards Raven as a sharp, play-by-play adversary turned mutually beneficial node in her widening network. She enjoys the woman’s ability to pivot mid-negotiation and even finds the dry humor disarming, but the open-ended favor means Alex keeps one eye on the scoreboard. For now Raven is filed under "useful, potentially trustworthy, never unmonitored," the kind of link Alex intends to cultivate without surrendering leverage.
rel_1_to_2.recent_events:
• Raven abandoned her all-or-nothing ploy after Alex’s feigned perplexity, signaling adaptive respect.
• They sealed the exchange with a handshake that transferred two intel packages in return for an undefined future favor.
• Shared banter over Spice-Girl codenames broke the final tension, leaving Alex amused and mildly impressed.
rel_1_to_2.history:
– Contact established indirectly through Alina’s New Orleans lead.
– First face-to-face meeting: Raven’s leverage test met Alex’s counter-questioning, flipping initiative to Alex.
– Negotiation evolved from rigid pricing to an open-ended favor after Alex dismissed Raven’s framing as "weird."
– Deal closed with firm handshake; relationship now anchored by a single outstanding favor and mutual curiosity about each other’s networks.

leverage_points.character1_leverage: Corporate-grade access and credibility Alex can extend when the favor is called in.
leverage_points.character2_leverage: An open-ended favor Alex owes, plus Raven’s proven ability to supply critical intel.

conflict_areas: Ambiguity around the scope and timing of the favor
Potential clashes if Raven’s request jeopardizes Alex’s crew or intellectual property

intelligence.information_sought: Alex wants to map Raven’s wider network reach and long-term agenda.
intelligence.information_protected: Alex guards Nexus IP details and future movement plans from Raven.

rel_2_to_1.dynamic: Raven finds Alex unpredictably refreshing—a client who sidesteps power games with disarming candor yet still pays in something far more valuable than creds. She now sees Alex as a high-potential asset: resourceful, networked, and just reckless enough to open doors conventional brokers can’t. The favor in Raven’s ledger gives her comfortable leverage, but Alex’s quick wit has earned genuine professional respect.
rel_2_to_1.recent_events:
• Alex’s refusal to engage in the staged choice forced Raven to recalibrate her negotiation strategy on the fly.
• The handshake confirmed an open favor and showcased Alex’s willingness to honor non-violent terms.
• Alex’s Spice-Girl naming spree provided Raven with character insight and a memorable bonding moment.
rel_2_to_1.history:
– Initial intel drop arranged through Alina, but Raven’s real curiosity centered on Alex’s reputation.
– First meeting tested Alex with an all-or-nothing offer; Alex’s amused pushback revealed a negotiator worth cultivating.
– Raven shifted to an access-for-favor model, cementing a longer horizon connection.
– Departure left Raven satisfied, amused, and already plotting situations where Alex’s vouching power could be decisive.

leverage_points.character1_leverage: Open-ended favor owed by Alex, plus Raven’s control over future intel flow.
leverage_points.character2_leverage: Alex’s ability to grant high-level access, corporate insider knowledge, and reputation backing.

conflict_areas: Alex’s tendency to derail standard bargaining scripts
Risk that Alex’s corporate enemies could splash back on Raven
mutual_interests: Avoiding high-profile bloodshed that limits future deals

intelligence.information_sought: Raven wants a clearer map of Alex’s influence web and proof she can deliver access when called.
intelligence.information_protected: Raven keeps her client list, data-farm locations, and deeper motives sealed off from Alex.
